originContent: This is an integrated ComfyUI Qwen-Image image generation sampler node,support Z-Image. Compared to using the official KSampler, it eliminates the messy wiring, supports both text-to-image and image-to-image generation, solves the offset issues of the official nodes, and integrates prompt input box, automatic image scaling, automatic memory/vRAM cleanup, batch generation, automatic saving and other comprehensive optimization features, so mom no longer has to worry about my messy wiring~~~~

- **Memory Management**: Enable GPU/CPU cleanup options to improve resource efficiency

originContent: - **Batch Processing**: Set batch_size > 1 for multiple image generation

originContent: - **Text-to-Image Mode**: Must set width (Width) and height (Height), these are required parameters

originContent: - **Image-to-Image Mode**: Must provide at least one reference image (Image1), supports up to 5 reference images (Image1-Image5)

originContent: - **Batch Size**: Choose between 1-10, adjust according to GPU memory, recommend starting testing from 1

originContent: - **Resolution (Width/Height)**: Must be multiples of 8, range 0-16384, recommend starting testing from lower resolutions (like 512x512)

originContent: - **Sampling Steps**: Qwen models recommend 4-20 steps, too high may increase computation time but not necessarily improve quality

- **Valeur CFG** : Plage 0-100, d√©faut 1.0, recommand√© entre 1.0 et 7.0

originContent: - **Denoise Strength**: Range 0-1, default 1.0, can lower appropriately in image-to-image mode

originContent: - **AuraFlow Shift**: Range 0-100, default 3.0, used to balance generation speed and quality

originContent: - **CFG Normalization Strength**: Range 0-100, default 1.0, stabilizer for CFG

originContent: - **Automatic Scaling**: Text-to-image must input width and height parameters, image-to-image fills in to auto-scale reference images while maintaining aspect ratio, setting either width or height to 0 disables scaling
translatedContent: - **Mise √† l'√âchelle Automatique** : En texte-√†-image, il faut entrer les param√®tres largeur et hauteur, en image-√†-image, ces param√®tres permettent la mise √† l‚Äô√©chelle automatique des images de r√©f√©rence tout en conservant le ratio d‚Äôaspect, d√©finir soit la largeur soit la hauteur √† 0 d√©sactive la mise √† l‚Äô√©chelle

originContent: - **Reference Image Order**: Supports up to 5 reference images, processed in order Image1-Image5, Image1 is the main image

originContent: - **GPU Memory Cleanup**: Enable enable_clean_gpu_memory option, automatically clean VRAM before/after generation

originContent: - **CPU Memory Cleanup**: Enable enable_clean_cpu_memory_after_finish, clean RAM after generation completes (including file cache, processes, dynamic libraries)

originContent: - For continuous large-scale generation, it is recommended to always enable memory cleanup options to prevent memory overflow

originContent: - **Output Folder**: Set auto_save_output_folder to enable auto-save function, leave blank to disable, supports absolute and relative paths
